name: summy
description: Context management middleware for LLM conversations

scripts.kill: taskkill /F /IM node.exe /T 2>nul || echo No node processes found
scripts.start: npm run kill && npm run server:start && npm run client:start
scripts.build: npm run server:build && npm run client:build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
